biotools.summary: A software of SUMO Substrates Prediction. Small Ubiquitin-related MOdifier (SUMO) proteins are ubiquitously expressed in eukaryotic cells , and implicatedly regulate various cellular processes, e.g. stress responsing , cell-cycle progression, and gene expression , etc.
